position: Senior Full-stack Engineer / Project Technical Lead
contentParagraphs: Worked on eight diverse projects across a wide range of industries. With a strong focus on delivering high-quality solutions, I have gained valuable experience in developing innovative software applications and contributing to successful project delivery.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain relationships with stakeholders, vendors, and other third parties
Manage projects to deliver on time and under the budget
Directly work closely with the customers on product development and provide product support
Determining the underlying architecture for the software
Bring technical expertise to solve hard problems, adapt to change, and leverage new technologies and best practices
Drive and lead technical initiatives in software engineering processes to be up-to-date with the best practices
Mentor coworkers through code review, pair programming, team collaboration, and training to improve collective knowledge and best practices
Lead project teams and ensure effective communication and collaboration
Pre-sale activities including kick-off meetings, requirement gathering and analysis, proposal preparation
Improve company engineering standards, tooling, and processes
achievements: Developed a lucid competency matrix to form better teams, identify gaps, and plan accordingly
Simultaneously managed multiple projects, ensuring timely delivery and staying within budget constraints
Coordinated teams of 6 programmers and provided hands-on supervision throughout the development process. Fostered a collaborative environment that improved team cohesion and productivity
Collaborated with a team of developers to implement API security measures, resulting in a 40% reduction in security vulnerabilities and a 15% increase in overall API security
Facilitated a positive onboarding experience, contributing to improved teamwork, early guidance, and seamless team integration. Got talent growth boost up to 23%
Served as a technical adviser to both managers and clients, providing valuable insights that contributed to informed decision-making and overall project success
Led requirement gathering and analysis efforts, streamlining the process to ensure a more comprehensive understanding of project needs
Researched and evaluated new technologies to improve API performance, resulting in the implementation of a new caching system that improved API response time by 35%
